turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, I would like to order a Caffè Latte from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK. What Starbucks would you like to order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm at the Starbucks at the Atlanta airport, at 6000 N Terminal Pkwy, Atlanta, GA 30320.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK. What milk kind would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like 2% milk please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK. Would you like any flavors with that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes I guess, could you add honey to the coffee order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes of course.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: OK, great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else you want with the order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, could you add whipped cream too?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, that would be fine.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: OK.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else with that order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that should be it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK. To confirm: you want a Caffè Latte with 2% milk and honey and whipped cream. Is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK. That's for the Starbucks at the Atlanta airport, 6000 N Terminal Pkwy, Atlanta, GA 30320.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK. Your order is on its way.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Goodbye.
